version_description:
- Dynamic weather pictures added, feel the weather without leaving home
- Sharply reduce the size of the package, taking up the smallest space to give you the best experience
- Optimize interface UI for smoother interaction

- Optimize notification settings for easier management of all push in the app
- Optimize weather icons
- Fixed a blank list of data caused by network problems

- Added 24-hour air quality, hourly PM2.5 quality report
- User feedback function is online
- Notification bug fixed

- Data update speed optimization. Improve data accuracy and timeliness
- Fix known bugs

1. Notification Center widget function is online, you can view the weather forecast without opening the application left slide/pull down screen! Super convenient!
2. Optimize client response speed, refresh faster, and master first-hand weather information
Optimize widget functionality

- Correct some data delay problems and optimize response speed
- Add widget today's weather forecast and one week weather forecast to see weather more easily

- Optimize push arrival rate, weather changes and warnings in time
- Optimize positioning accuracy, weather accurate to the street
- The icon is fully upgraded, with higher recognition

1. On-line Siri shortcut function, a password can call Siri to view the weather forecast in Siri at any time.
2. Optimize the notification center widget function, respond faster and refresh in time
3. Improve iOS12 system compatibility

1. Add sharing function, share real-time weather with one click
2. Optimize client performance and use it more smoothly

1. Optimize sharing function
2. bug fixed
性能和稳定性的改进

1. 提升推送覆盖到达率
2.修复已知bug

1. 优化已关注城市列表管理，一键查看各个城市天气！
2. 提升区域定位准确性，精准预报每条街道的天气变化
3.推送内容优化，提供更加人性化的预报内容，满足日常所需
Performance improvements you won't necessarily notice but definitely enhancing your experience with the app.
Performance&stability tweaks to make your experience with the app even better.

- improve data accuracy
- Stability improvements

· Support theme selection, choose different style interface display according to your preferences
· Localized language problem correction
· 性能和稳定性调整，使您的应用程序体验更好。

· New features on-line: Custom weather background, support for shooting real photo and video
· Added Russian, German localized language

· 主页背景自定义,支持拍摄实景上传美图或视频
· 提供更全面直观的生活指数参考
· 交互优化,操作更流畅

· 新增多语言切换功能
· 你也许不会注意到性能的改善，但是你使用本 app 的体验一定会得到提高

· Adapt to the iPad version
· Performance and stability adjustments are better for your application experience

· Air quality information optimization
· Localized language optimization
· Fix known bugs
· Performance and stability adjustments to make your app experience better

· Current weather and 15 days forecast module added details page, click to view more information about wind, humidity, pressure, rainfall, etc.
· Covering more comprehensive air quality index
· More detail optimization, continuous improvement of the experience

· Access to global authoritative data
· Self-selection of different data sources
· Fix other known bugs and optimize user experience
